_comment: This is an example of how to structure your real market data
_instructions: 1. Replace the dummy percentages with your actual market research data
2. Update volumes to reflect real sales data in millions of units
3. Ensure pepsi + cocaCola percentages = 100 for each state
4. Keep the same state codes (mx-ag, mx-bc, etc.) - these match the map topology
5. After updating, rename or copy this structure to market-data.json
